block.p: Re ''Finding Some Calm After Living With 'the Shakes' '' (Personal Health, May 29): I remember my hands shaking when I was 19, in college. I always thought it was stress, or fatigue, or caffeine. I never imagined there might be a treatment. Finally, at 55, I sought a doctor's assistance, and with a daily dose of propranolol, my tremors ceased. I urge those who suffer from essential tremors to overcome their fears and ask for help.
